p: Neurological manifestations associated with DENV and ZIKV were recently reviewed by Li etÂ al. [14]. The neurological manifestations described in children were seizures or tonic-clonic seizures, convulsions [5], [14], [26]; meningitis signs with acute onset of fever, headache, vomiting, nuchal rigidity [19]; encephalitis signs of cerebral involvement with altered consciousness or cognition [14], [23], increase of intracranial pressure [18], [19], drowsiness, tremors [19].
